name: ntfy
title: Ntfy
description: Send notifications to your devices using ntfy.sh
author: wesleycoder

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: ntfy
commands.title: Send Notification
commands.subtitle: Send a notification via ntfy.sh
commands.description: Sends a message or link to your device via ntfy.sh notification

commands.name: ntfy-clip
commands.title: Send Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Send clipboard via ntfy.sh
commands.description: Sends the current clipboard content (or selected text) via ntfy.sh notification

commands.name: ntfy-topics
commands.title: Manage Topics
commands.subtitle: Manage topics for use with this extension
commands.description: Add, edit, remove, and list topics for use with this extension

commands.name: ntfy-servers
commands.title: Manage Servers
commands.subtitle: Manage servers for use with this extension
commands.description: Add, edit, remove, and list servers for use with this extension

commands.name: ntfy-list
commands.title: List Notifications
commands.subtitle: Received notifications from all servers and topics
commands.description: Refresh and list received notifications from all servers and topics

commands.name: ntfy-fetch
commands.title: Enable Background Notifications
commands.subtitle: Fetch notifications from all servers and topics
commands.description: Add a menu bar icon that fetches notifications from all servers and topics in the background
